CodeÔÉÅ

LUE uses the listed third-party libraries as follows:

  • GDAL

  • HPX

  • Boost

  • HDF5

  • docopt

  • fmt

  • GLFW

  • Google Performance Tools (gperftools)

  • Vulkan

  • nlohmann-json3-dev

  • NumPy

  • Pybind11

  • ImGui

Licenses for third-party libraries are referenced in the LUE GitHub license.
